name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi超生誕祭2021 ゲスト：角巻わため／桃鈴ねね [RyrHynHHbmY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Neko ni Nattara Ikeru' (If I become a cat, I can make it).
MC section where the guests (Watame and Nene) talk about the performance and prepare for the next song.
Solo performance of 'Kaibutsu' (Monster) by Tsunomaki Watame.

subtitles.original: ほんとやばい
subtitles.english: Truly awful

subtitles.original: 起きたら12時
subtitles.english: When I woke up, it was noon

subtitles.original: LINEめちゃ来てる
subtitles.english: I have tons of LINE messages

subtitles.original: でもしょうがない
subtitles.english: But it can't be helped

subtitles.original: 逆に二度寝しましょ
subtitles.english: On the contrary, let's take a second nap

subtitles.original: だから猫になって甘やかされたい
subtitles.english: So I want to become a cat and be pampered

subtitles.original: 猫になって愛されたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and be loved

subtitles.original: 猫になってお昼寝させて
subtitles.english: Let me become a cat and take a nap

subtitles.original: 起きたら100万登録だ
subtitles.english: When I wake up, I'll have a million subscribers

subtitles.original: 猫になって輝きたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and shine

subtitles.original: 猫になって開拓するよ
subtitles.english: I'll become a cat and pioneer

subtitles.original: もっと君に伝わりますように
subtitles.english: So that it reaches you even more

subtitles.original: もっともっと！
subtitles.english: More and more!

subtitles.original: 猫になって甘やかされたい ずっと
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and be pampered forever

subtitles.original: 猫になって抱きしめられたい もっと
subtitles.english: I want to become a cat and be hugged even more

subtitles.original: 猫になって恋してたの
subtitles.english: I was in love as a cat

subtitles.original: 猫になって笑い合おうよ
subtitles.english: Let's become cats and laugh together

subtitles.original: もっとみんな猫になっちゃおうよ
subtitles.english: Let's everyone become cats more

subtitles.original: 猫ならいける
subtitles.english: If it's a cat, it'll work

subtitles.original: ねねとならいける
subtitles.english: With Nene, it'll work

subtitles.original: どこまでもついていくよ！
subtitles.english: I'll follow you anywhere!

subtitles.original: にゃーーー！
subtitles.english: Nyaaa!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: わためー！ねねちー！
subtitles.english: Watame! Nenechi!

subtitles.original: わためー！今日は羊から猫になって...
subtitles.english: Watame! Today you went from a sheep to a cat...

subtitles.original: 今日だけ猫ちゃん
subtitles.english: Just for today, a kitty cat

subtitles.original: ねねちとこの曲を歌ったら絶対楽しいと思って
subtitles.english: I thought it would definitely be fun to sing this song with Nenechi

subtitles.original: 今日、今実際にめっちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was actually really fun today, just now!

subtitles.original: コメントもみんな、ちょうどね、スタンプに「にゃ」っていうのがあるんですよ
subtitles.english: In the comments too, everyone, just right there, there's a 'nya' stamp

subtitles.original: それでみんな猫になってもらいました
subtitles.english: So I had everyone become cats

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 可愛かった！めっちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was cute! It was so much fun!

subtitles.original: わためも合いの手ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Watame, thanks for the backing calls too!

subtitles.original: 「にゃ」しか言ってないんだけど
subtitles.english: I only said 'nya' though

subtitles.original: 「めぇ」じゃないの
subtitles.english: It's not 'mee'?

subtitles.original: にゃ！
subtitles.english: Nya!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、次はわためのソロパート！
subtitles.english: And so, next is Watame's solo part!

subtitles.original: 楽しみ！頑張って！
subtitles.english: Can't wait! Good luck!

subtitles.original: 頑張る！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: ねねおじとあずおじするんだ。待ってるからな。
subtitles.english: Nene-oji and Azu-oji will be watching. I'll be waiting.

subtitles.original: あ、見られる側って、こういう気持ちだったんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, being the one watched... this is how it feels

subtitles.original: 頑張って！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: 脇ストリームじゃない！
subtitles.english: It's not a 'Waki Stream'!

subtitles.original: ではここからはソロですね。頑張りたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Well, from here it's solo. I'm going to do my best!

subtitles.original: 猫から、この曲になります。
subtitles.english: From a cat, I'll transform into this song.

subtitles.original: 「怪物」！
subtitles.english: Monster!

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい世界に今日も乾杯 街に飛び交う笑い声も
subtitles.english:
A toast to this wonderful world again today
Even the laughter flying around the city

subtitles.original: 見て見ぬふりしてるだけの作りもんさ 気が触れそうだ
subtitles.english:
Is just a fabrication that everyone's pretending not to see
I feel like I'm losing my mind

subtitles.original: くらくらするほどの良い匂いが ツンと刺した鼻の奥
subtitles.english:
A scent so strong it makes me dizzy
Stung deep in the back of my nose

subtitles.original: 目を覚ます本能のまま 今日は誰の番だ この世界で
subtitles.english:
Awakening just as my instincts dictate
Whose turn is it today in this world?

subtitles.original: 何ができるのか
subtitles.english: What can I do?

subtitles.original: 僕には何ができるのか
subtitles.english: What is it that I can do?

subtitles.original: ただその真っ黒な目から 涙こぼれ落ちないように
subtitles.english:
Just so that tears don't spill
From those pitch-black eyes

subtitles.original: ああ願う未来に何度でもずっと
subtitles.english: Ah, to the future I wish for, over and over, forever

subtitles.original: 食らいつくこの間違いだらけの世界の中君には笑ってほしいから
subtitles.english:
I'll cling to it, in this error-filled world
Because I want you to be smiling

subtitles.original: もう誰も傷つけない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone be hurt anymore

subtitles.original: 強く強くなりたいんだよ 僕が僕でいられるように
subtitles.english:
I want to become strong, so strong
So that I can remain as myself

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい世界は今日も安泰 街に渦巻く悪い話も
subtitles.english:
The wonderful world is peaceful again today
Even the bad stories swirling through the city

subtitles.original: 知らない知らないふりして目を逸らした 正気の沙汰じゃないな
subtitles.english:
I pretended not to know and looked away
It's not the behavior of someone sane

subtitles.original: 真面目に着飾った行進 鳴らす足音が弾む
subtitles.english:
A march dressed up in seriousness
The sound of footsteps ringing out is bouncy

subtitles.original: 行き先は消えない消えない 味が染み付いている 裏側の世界
subtitles.english:
The destination won't disappear
The taste is soaked in, the world on the other side

subtitles.original: 清く正しく生きること 誰も悲しませずに生きること
subtitles.english:
Living purely and correctly
Living without making anyone sad

subtitles.original: はみ出さずに真っ直ぐに生きること それが間違わないで生きること
subtitles.english:
Living straight without stepping out of line
That is what it means to live without mistakes

subtitles.original: ありのままでいることが正義か
subtitles.english: Is staying as you are a form of justice?

subtitles.original: 騙し騙し生きるのは正義か
subtitles.english: Is living by deceiving a form of justice?

subtitles.original: 僕のあるべき姿とはなんだ
subtitles.english: What is the way I ought to be?

subtitles.original: 本当の僕は何者なんだ 教えてくれ
subtitles.english: Who am I really? Tell me
